storyInfo: Ayerscarpe travels with a self-proclaimed Catastrophe Messenger, in search of Leonhardt in a Catastrophe-devastated area.

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Strange Woman

attributes.content: This way... no, that way? What did that say again...
attributes.name: Strange Woman

attributes.content: Should be this way. There's the polluted area.
attributes.name: Strange Woman

attributes.content: Let me double-check to be sure...
attributes.name: Strange Woman

attributes.content: Hey, wait for me!
attributes.name: Strange Woman

attributes.content: Oh, what a coincidence, you were headed the right way.
attributes.name: Strange Woman

attributes.content: Like I said, you're needed later, not right now.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: But I'm starting to doubt your abilities as a Catastrophe Messenger.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: What? Don't talk about things you know nothing about.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: The job of a Catastrophe Messenger carries a huge responsibility. Many lives hinge upon being able to accurately determine the movement of a Catastrophe. It's better to be safe than sorry.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Why do you think there are so few of us? You're lucky to have even met me. It's not like you've met any others before, right?
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: ...Cut the crap.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Admit it. You need my help to enter the post-Catastrophe area.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: I admit it.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Can we continue now?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: So, who's this guy who Cowell kidnapped and took into the disaster zone, what is he to you?
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: (Inhale)
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Hey, don't be so quick to clam up. You know I'm looking for Cowell because I have a debt to settle with him. It'd be a problem if the one you're looking for is actually on his side.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: You brought down a whole regiment of Cowell Mining guards, practically laughing while sitting in the electric chair. You're not someone I want to mess with.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: So I need to know who he is. We're working together, aren't we?
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: ...He's my employer.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Employer? Are you his bodyguard?
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: We were employed by Maize Drill Inc., Cowell Mining's competitor. You may have heard of the name.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: The first company to send a survey team into this disaster zone, right?
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: They entered from the southeast, quickly securing the ore deposit for Maize Drill.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: We were employed by that survey team. The veins they discovered were just the tip of the iceberg. There are indications of more exposed veins at the former site of the central plaza.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: The company was going to perform a second survey, this time entering from the north, and had set up a temporary camp on the edge.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: I went into town yesterday morning for a shopping trip... edamame... and when I returned, the camp was in ruins, and there was no one to be found.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: I tracked my employer's signal to the camp you were at, but found only the tracking device.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: And you know the rest.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Well, I admire your professionalism, but I must remind you that Cowell is leading this band personally. Lots of heads are gonna roll on this trip, and your employer's is probably one of them.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: This is Rim Billiton. No need for you to get involved.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: My contract remains valid until my employer's death is confirmed.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: I do the job I'm paid to.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Suit yourself.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: There might be another polluted area ahead. Let me check... hey, wait up.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: You walk fast.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Stop complaining, Le—
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Le-what?
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: ...Nothing.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: I'm beginning to suspect that you're hiding something from me.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: I'm hiding a lot of things from you.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: ...I guess, but there's one thing in particular that's concerning me.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: You lost contact with your employer, right?
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Then how do you know the way?
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Multiple times, you've moved before I said anything, but it always ends up being the right direction.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: How are you doing it?
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Does it matter?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Could it be that you're with Cowell...?
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Look here.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: At what?
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: On the ground.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Originium dust, sand, ash... the same mix you see everywhere after a Catastrophe.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: That grey stuff is sand, not ash.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Tiny particles of eroded limestone that would ordinarily blend into yellow sand.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: That's pretty specialized knowledge... but what does it mean?
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: ...It's normally mixed in, but now it's on the surface by itself.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Someone made it happen. On purpose.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Oh!
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Separating different types of sand is a special trick of my employer's. He left this as a mark, one that the enemy is unlikely to notice.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: So you were secretly following it as a trail this whole time.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Here, there... there's a lot of it.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Sounds like your employer's a pretty smart guy.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Tch.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: 'Tch'?!
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Just a guy who's bad with money... a real jerk.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Sounds like you guys are pretty close.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: As close as it takes to punch him in the face.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: If that's the case, why would someone like you be working for him? Extortion? Blackmail?
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: He's my first employer. Changing jobs would be a pain.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Have you ever thought about doing something else? Is there anything you wish you could?
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: No idea.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: What did you used to do?
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: I... I'd never left home before I started working for Leon.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Let's just say—purely hypothetically—that you're on good terms with your employer, and he's dead when you find him...
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Now you're no longer bound by your contract. Would you do anything... outside the scope of it?
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: No. What are you implying?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Well, there's a lot you could do with your skills. Say... taking revenge for him.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: That would be meaningless.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Simple. Anyone who could kill my employer is someone I couldn't deal with on my own. It would be suicide.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: The logical thing would be to turn around and leave. The bodyguard contract has expired.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Regardless of whether I was at fault, there's still no reason to stay and make the situation worse.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Even if I had a mind to take revenge, I wouldn't just rush in hot-hotheadedly. I would make a plan, wait for the right opportunity.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Only fools let revenge occupy their minds.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Enough delay. We need to catch up.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Over there!
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Get down!
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Quick! Put on your mask!
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Mm.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Looking at the particle distribution patterns, this wasn't caused by aftershocks. It's...
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: The disintegration of Infected.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: There must be many Infected bodies nearby. But why? Did the Catastrophe Messenger in charge of this area not give any evacuation notice?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Unlikely. The situation in the east indicates that there was plenty of advance warning. There should have been enough time to give notice and evacuate.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: How could this have happened? Was the Catastrophe Messenger new to the job?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: There's another possibility...
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Maybe they did give warning in time... but someone intentionally prevented the notice from reaching the population.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: By the time anyone realized, it was too late.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Delay the Catastrophe warnings? Why would anyone do that?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: This is Rim Billiton. The mining companies run the show.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Catastrophes reveal ore veins, so every time one happens it results in a scramble by the companies to claim the new ones.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Sometimes, this takes the form of delaying the communication of evacuation notices... if you're unscrupulous enough.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Bastards...
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Cowell planned this well, but he didn't count on your survey team moving even quicker than he did.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: You must have a good Catastrophe Messenger on your side. Anyway, it threw a wrench into his plans.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: I guess that piece of fowlbeast dung has turned to kidnapping now.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Leon...
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Like I said, you shouldn't be too optimistic about your employer's prospects in Cowell's hands.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: We keep going.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Didn't find anything.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: You searched the entire area?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: I scanned every inch, but nothing. No new markings.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: ...You're right, the trail ends here.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: The prospective mining area was in the south. If that's their target...
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Compass doesn't work here.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: We'll expand the search radius. You said there were signs of an approaching sandstorm. How far away is it?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: 20 minutes, tops.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Oh, right! I think I caught a glimpse of a cave behind that hill.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Could be man-made. There might be enemies.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Lead the way.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: It's dark...
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Do you smell that? Seems like blood.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Keep going.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: ...Didn't think you'd need someone to scout the way for you. And to think I worked so hard to help you avoid polluted areas and secondary disaster zones.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: You were the one who insisted on coming with me.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe
Catastrophe Messenger
attributes.content: Fine, fine...

attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger
attributes.content: Whoa!
Get back!
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Ayerscarpe? It's me!
You're... Cruise Jr.? From the survey team?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Thank goodness you remember me.
attributes.name: Cruise Jr.

attributes.content: Just you here? Where are the others?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: ...Let me take a look at your arm.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Blunt trauma and some deep cuts... properly treated, though. You'll be fine.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: This bandaging... did Leonhardt do this?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: ...Yes.
attributes.name: Cruise Jr.

attributes.content: Injuring an arm. Cowell's favorite punishment. Can't do anything in Rim Billiton without a good pair of hands.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Where are the others? Where's Leonhardt? Is he with the rest of them?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: I'm the only one here. Leonhardt saved my life...
attributes.name: Cruise Jr.

attributes.content: What did he say to you?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: He told me to wait here for you... before he died...
attributes.name: Cruise Jr.

attributes.content: What did you say? He died?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Yeah...
attributes.name: Cruise Jr.

attributes.content: Are you sure?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: I know it's hard to accept... but no one could have survived that explosion.
attributes.name: Cruise Jr.

attributes.content: Explosion... Tell me everything. I need to know what happened to him.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Every last detail.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Ayerscarpe...
attributes.name: Cruise Jr.

attributes.content: Hey, don't give him such a scary look. He just had a brush with death. Cut him some slack.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Leonhardt told me to give you this.
attributes.name: Cruise Jr.

attributes.content: His gaze moves slowly to the bundle of clothing.
The clothes he had seen so many times before look so unfamiliar now. Just looking at the blood stains makes his eyes hurt.
Leonhardt always kept his clothes sparkling clean, not a speck of dust on them. Annoyingly so.
How could this have happened?
He also asked me to passed on a message...
attributes.name: Cruise Jr.

attributes.content: 'Stay away, Ayers.'
attributes.name: Cruise Jr.

attributes.content: I couldn't hear the next part very clearly, but I think he said...
attributes.name: Cruise Jr.

attributes.content: 'I'm terminating your contract.'
attributes.name: Cruise Jr.

attributes.content: The words were like a needle piercing his ear. His hand trembles as he receives the clothes.
There is a lump in his throat that he cannot swallow.
In the end, all he does is take a deep breath.
I see...
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Ayerscarpe...
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Your employer... your friend. Was he a Catastrophe Messenger?
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: A decent one. It's a shame, but it is what it is.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: It's okay. I guess I'm no longer contracted.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: I'll get some rest, then head back the way we came.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Why are you just staring at me? Sit down.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: He leans against the rock wall and slides down, setting the clothes aside.
Then he feels something heavy inside the clothes.
He reaches into the pocket.
There is a box of edamame inside.
Hey! Where are you going?
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Out of my way!
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Are you crazy? There's a sandstorm outside!
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: That's nothing! Leon... he wouldn't die so easily!
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: And even if he's dead, I'll...
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Calm down!
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: You need to keep a cool head! You won't achieve anything if you don't take stock of the situation.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Trust me, no one wants a piece of Cowell more than I do.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: We've come so far! There are only so many places he can run, this deep into the disaster zone.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Be patient. We're so close.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Mm.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: At least wait for the sandstorm to subside.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: 15 minutes later.
The mine exploded as soon as I got out, throwing me off my feet.
attributes.name: Cruise Jr.

attributes.content: I got up and ran without looking back, all the way here.
attributes.name: Cruise Jr.

attributes.content: Just to double-check, towards the south, along that crag, right?
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Yeah, that's the way I came.
attributes.name: Cruise Jr.

attributes.content: The sandstorm has mostly subsided.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: You could stay here, Ayerscarpe, if you need some time to collect your thoughts...
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Let's go.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: The mine entrance is blocked. We can't get in on our own.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Yup.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Tire tracks. They were here.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Not sure if they're leading into or away from the mine. And we can't tell what's inside from here.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Those rocks wouldn't trap him. He could destroy them easily.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: But it's sealed shut, and there was an explosion...
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: If he's still alive, he would have followed them, trying to rescue the others.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: If they're looking for new veins... there's only one way to find them. Inside.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: But the area ahead is heavily polluted, with high risk of a secondary disaster. Going in by ourselves is a big risk.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: They'll have to come back this way eventually, even with proper protection. We can wait here and ambush Cowell.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: We keep going.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Can't you just accept the truth already?
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: What truth? I still haven't seen him with my own eyes.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Your turn. Leon can move through polluted areas unhindered. I'm sure you can manage too, being a Catastrophe Messenger yourself.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: I... I'll do what I can.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Wind and sand everywhere. I can't see anything.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Maybe... perhaps... according to my observations...
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Shut it!
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Infected creature! Behind you!
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Thanks...
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: This is a bad place to fight.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: There's a house over there! We can take shelter.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Mm.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Whew... like I said, this is too much for the two of us.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: Here comes the sandstorm again.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger

attributes.content: You're not a Catastrophe Messenger, are you?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: No, I'm not.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger?

attributes.content: I knew the facade wouldn't hold up ever since you mentioned that your employer was a real one. I'm actually surprised it took you so long to call me out on it.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger?

attributes.content: Who are you then?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: I'm Tamika. I'm a bodyguard, like you.
attributes.name: Catastrophe Messenger?

attributes.content: Do you still want to travel with me?
attributes.name: Tamika

attributes.content: Doesn't matter to me.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: We could both die here, though. I wouldn't get my revenge, and you wouldn't save your friend.
attributes.name: Tamika

attributes.content: But like I said, you could stay, and I'll keep going. Could be one less corpse in our future.
attributes.name: Tamika

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Tamika

attributes.content: Why can't you accept that your friend is dead? Is it worth giving up your life just to see for yourself?
attributes.name: Tamika

attributes.content: Do you remember what I told you about the Catastrophe warning? The one that was covered up?
attributes.name: Tamika

attributes.content: The Catastrophe Messenger who sent the warning was my best friend... I was the one who got her the job.
attributes.name: Tamika

attributes.content: Did you learn about Catastrophes from her?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Yeah. My protective gear belonged to her too.
attributes.name: Tamika

attributes.content: Then how... Did Cowell kill a Catastrophe Messenger?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Cowell Mining blocked off communications when signs of Catastrophe appeared. The residents never got the warning.
attributes.name: Tamika

attributes.content: She rushed back when she learned about it. The Catastrophe was very near by then, but she headed straight into the red zone to help with the evacuation.
attributes.name: Tamika

attributes.content: I was one step too late, just in time to see a cloud of Originium dust swallow her whole...
attributes.name: Tamika

attributes.content: Just thinking of what she saw in her last moments made my blood boil. I wanted to tear Cowell limb from limb with my bare hands.
attributes.name: Tamika

attributes.content: Until I met you, someone else who'd lost someone important... Then I understood.
attributes.name: Tamika

attributes.content: To be honest, I wanted to use you to get rid of Cowell. But I have to admit, you were right.
attributes.name: Tamika

attributes.content: Revenge isn't worth it.
attributes.name: Tamika

attributes.content: You're strong enough to survive here. There are many things you can do in place of your friend.
attributes.name: Tamika

attributes.content: Not like me. I've come too far to turn back... Leave the rest to me.
attributes.name: Tamika

attributes.content: You're overthinking it.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: I would've come here, with or without you. I came because there's something I wanted to see.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: I'm doing what I'm doing... because Leon isn't dead.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: My employer isn't dead, so I still have a job to do, as a bodyguard.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: How can you be so sure?
attributes.name: Tamika

attributes.content: Leon is a jerk. Talks too much, gets into trouble. Gets me into trouble.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: But he knows how to survive, better than anyone. I've lost count of the times we've worked together to get out of a tight spot.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: He's the reason I'm having this conversation with you, rather than turning into a dried-out husk in the barrenlands.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: I know him. Those words didn't sound like something he'd say. I need to see with my own eyes.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: And... he promised me something he still hasn't done. I won't let him off the hook that easily.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Fine, assuming your friend's not dead, how are we gonna find him? Is he just gonna drop from the sky?
attributes.name: Tamika

attributes.content: No, what you said made me remember...
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Leon always drawled on about the properties of Catastrophes.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Tch. So many things floated to the surface when I heard he was dead.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Including these.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: You just wait, Leon.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: T-That's nuts!
attributes.name: Tamika

attributes.content: Is that how you and your friend have been avoiding danger in Catastrophe zones?
attributes.name: Tamika

attributes.content: It was Leon's idea. I had to make do with what's available. Is there a problem?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: That's just climbing out the fire and into the frying pan... or is it the other way round? Whatever, doesn't matter. No wonder you were able to penetrate the disaster zone so quickly.
attributes.name: Tamika

attributes.content: We're here.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Tire tracks... they've been here alright.
attributes.name: Tamika

attributes.content: Someone's coming!
attributes.name: Tamika

attributes.content: Cowell's muscles. Much tougher than the ones in the camp. Even you...
attributes.name: Tamika

attributes.content: We'll need a plan, find a weak spot... Ayerscarpe?
attributes.name: Tamika

attributes.content: Ayerscarpe?!
attributes.name: Tamika

attributes.content: Argh—
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: Help!
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: R-Run away!
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: No—
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: I'm back. You said something?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: ...They're all down?
attributes.name: Tamika

attributes.content: I think so.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: I'm comfortable on the attack. Is there a problem?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: ...You've got to be kidding me.
attributes.name: Tamika

attributes.content: Did you find you friend?
attributes.name: Tamika

attributes.content: Not yet.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: If he's really dead... maybe I'll become a Catastrophe Messenger.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Tamika

attributes.content: Wait, there's another room over there.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Who are you? Guards! Intruders!
attributes.name: Cowell

attributes.content: Guards!
attributes.name: Cowell

attributes.content: Shut up.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: What do you want? I'm the owner of Cowell Mining! I own these mines! Is it money that you want? I can pay you!
attributes.name: Cowell

attributes.content: Enough. Just answer my question.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Where's the Catastrophe Messenger you kidnapped?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: He... he's inside the mines.
attributes.name: Cowell

attributes.content: Still alive?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: A-Alive! Absolutely alive! He was the one who led us here!
attributes.name: Cowell

attributes.content: I see.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: He's all yours.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Do you remember me, Cowell?
attributes.name: Tamika

attributes.content: T-Tamika? Is that you? P-Protect me! I'll pay you whatever you want!
attributes.name: Cowell

attributes.content: I stopped working for you the day you killed Claire. This one's for her...
attributes.name: Tamika

attributes.content: Claire...
attributes.name: Tamika

attributes.content: N-No! Stay back!
attributes.name: Cowell

attributes.content: He did not turn back. Into the mines he went, one step at a time.
His steps were anxious at first, but began to slow down as the sound from the walls became clearer.
At last, they are calm, steady.
Like going to meet an old friend.
I-I'm sure we can talk this out! No hasty moves, okay? Please!
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: *sigh*
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Oh, it feels so good to run freely into the sunset.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: All these Rim Billiton corporations are the same. I'm getting sick of them.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: I want to take a break. For at least a month.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: And how will we eat without an income?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: ...You have savings, don't you?
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Don't even think about it.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: I guess it's time to think about looking for a regular salary.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Say, there's something I've been curious about.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Go on.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: So I told you I was dead, and that our contract was terminated, yet you still came for me.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: What would you have done if you'd arrived and found out I was really dead?
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Hey, say something.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Don't tell me I don't mean anything to you? I mean, I've kept my promise, traveled the world with you... Traveling for work still counts, right?
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: I mean, it was just a few coins... okay, maybe more than a few... but you're not holding any grudges over it, are you?
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Say something!
attributes.name: Leonhardt
